options.content: SESIM FINECT

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "전체 로그"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "이상행동 탐지수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    is_attack = TRUE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "이전기간 이상탐지"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE is_attack = TRUE
AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) - (to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000) - to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000))
AND logged_at < to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000);

WITH
current_period AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS current_count
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
      AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
      AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
),
previous_period AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS previous_count
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
      AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) - INTERVAL '1 second' * (($__to - $__from) / 1000)
      AND logged_at < to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
)
SELECT
    current_period.current_count AS "현재 단위기간 공격횟수",
    previous_period.previous_count AS "이전 단위기간 공격횟수",
    CASE
        WHEN previous_period.previous_count = 0 AND current_period.current_count = 0 THEN 0
        WHEN previous_period.previous_count = 0 THEN NULL
        ELSE
            (current_period.current_count - previous_period.previous_count) * 100.0 / previous_period.previous_count
    END AS "공격 증감률"
FROM current_period, previous_period;

WITH logs AS (
  SELECT 
    is_attack,
    attack_type,
    status_code,
    url
  FROM ai_results_1
  WHERE logged_at BETWEEN to_timestamp($__from / 1000) AND to_timestamp($__to / 1000)
),
attack_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_requests,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_attack) AS total_attacks,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (
      WHERE 
        length(status_code) = 3 
        AND status_code LIKE '5%' 
        AND status_code ~ '^[0-9]{3}$'  -- 숫자 3자리인지 체크
        AND CAST(status_code AS integer) BETWEEN 500 AND 599
    ) AS error_5xx,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE url ILIKE '%../%' OR url ILIKE '%admin%' OR url ILIKE '%.php%') AS abnormal_paths,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE attack_type = 'ssrf_rfi') AS ssrf_rfi_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE attack_type = 'sql_injection') AS sql_injection_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE attack_type = 'xss') AS xss_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE attack_type = 'command_injection') AS command_injection_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE attack_type = 'directory_traversal') AS directory_traversal_count
  FROM logs
),
attack_scores AS (
  SELECT
    total_requests,
    total_attacks,
    error_5xx,
    abnormal_paths,
    ssrf_rfi_count,
    sql_injection_count,
    xss_count,
    command_injection_count,
    directory_traversal_count,
    
    LEAST(ssrf_rfi_count * 5, 10) AS ssrf_rfi_score,
    LEAST(sql_injection_count * 7, 15) AS sql_injection_score,
    LEAST(xss_count * 5, 10) AS xss_score,
    LEAST(command_injection_count * 8, 15) AS command_injection_score,
    LEAST(directory_traversal_count * 6, 12) AS directory_traversal_score
  FROM attack_counts
),
final_score AS (
  SELECT
    total_requests,
    total_attacks,
    error_5xx,
    abnormal_paths,
    ssrf_rfi_score,
    sql_injection_score,
    xss_score,
    command_injection_score,
    directory_traversal_score,
    
    GREATEST(
      0,
      100
      - ssrf_rfi_score
      - sql_injection_score
      - xss_score
      - command_injection_score
      - directory_traversal_score
      - LEAST((error_5xx::float / NULLIF(total_requests,1)) * 10, 10)
      - LEAST((abnormal_paths::float / NULLIF(total_requests,1)) * 7, 7)
    ) AS security_score
  FROM attack_scores
)
SELECT
  security_score AS "보안점수",
  CASE
    WHEN security_score >= 90 THEN '매우 양호'
    WHEN security_score >= 70 THEN '주의 필요'
    WHEN security_score >= 50 THEN '경고'
    WHEN security_score >= 30 THEN '위험'
    ELSE '심각'
  END AS "보안 상태"
FROM final_score;

SELECT client_ip as "IP"
, COUNT(*) AS "공격횟수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()  -- Grafana에서 시간 범위를 자동으로 설정
  AND is_attack = TRUE  -- 공격으로 표시된 로그만
GROUP BY "IP"
ORDER BY "공격횟수" DESC
LIMIT 10;  -- 상위 10개 IP만 표시

SELECT 
  attack_type AS "공격유형",
  COUNT(*) AS "공격횟수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE 
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND is_attack = TRUE
GROUP BY attack_type
ORDER BY "공격횟수" DESC;

SELECT 
    domain AS "도메인",
    path AS "경로",
    COUNT(*) AS "공격횟수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE 
    logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
    AND is_attack = TRUE
GROUP BY "도메인", "경로"
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: 가장 많이 공격 받은 경로 TOP 10

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "sql_injection"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'sql_injection'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "xss"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'xss'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "directory_traversal"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'directory_traversal'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "command_injection"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'command_injection'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "tls_probe"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'tls_probe'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "ssrf_rfi"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'ssrf_rfi'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

defaults.noValue: 등록된 데이터가 없습니다. DB를 확인해 주세요

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    logged_at AS "시간",
    attack_score AS "공격 확률",
    is_attack AS "공격",
    attack_type AS "공격유형",
    client_ip AS "IP",
    domain AS "도메인",
    path AS "경로"
FROM ai_results_1
ORDER BY logged_at DESC;

WITH top_attackers AS (
    SELECT client_ip
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
      AND logged_at BETWEEN to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) AND to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
    GROUP BY client_ip
    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    LIMIT 3
),
base_data AS (
    SELECT client_ip, domain, path, COUNT(*) AS cnt
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
      AND logged_at BETWEEN to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) AND to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
      AND client_ip IN (SELECT client_ip FROM top_attackers)
    GROUP BY client_ip, domain, path
)
SELECT 
    client_ip AS "Source",  -- 첫 번째 열: 소스 노드
    domain AS "Target",     -- 두 번째 열: 중간 노드 
    path AS "Destination",  -- 세 번째 열: 대상 노드
    cnt AS "Count"          -- 네 번째 열: 값
FROM base_data
ORDER BY cnt DESC;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('minute', logged_at)) AS time,  -- 분 단위로 그룹화
  COUNT(*) AS "이상탐지"  -- 해당 분에 발생한 공격 로그 수
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND is_attack = TRUE  -- 공격인 경우만 필터링
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('minute', logged_at) AS log_minute,
    COUNT(*) AS "전체"
FROM ai_results_1
GROUP BY log_minute
ORDER BY log_minute;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('minute', logged_at) AS log_minute,
    COUNT(*) AS "이상탐지"
FROM ai_results_1 where is_attack
GROUP BY log_minute
ORDER BY log_minute;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "양호",
  attack_type,
  '보통' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score <= 0.3
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "주의",
  attack_type,
  '주의' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score > 0.3 AND attack_score < 0.5
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "경고",
  attack_type,
  '위험' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score >= 0.5 AND attack_score < 0.7
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "위험",
  attack_type,
  '고위험' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score >= 0.7 AND attack_score < 0.9
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "매우위험",
  attack_type,
  '매우위험' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score >= 0.9
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;
